data.name: Atakebune
data.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with rockets.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Vulnerable vs. Incendiary Ships
- Low movement speed

variations.name: Atakebune
variations.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with rockets.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Vulnerable vs. Incendiary Ships
- Low movement speed
variations.descriptionCN:
装备有火箭的大型有帆战船。
+ 反建筑专家
- 不擅长对抗燃烧战船
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Battering Ram
data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed

variations.name: Battering Ram
variations.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed
variations.descriptionCN:
耐久的步兵运输工具，擅长对付建筑及城墙。
+ 高远程护甲
+ 高生命值
- 只能通过近战攻击受到额外的伤害
- 只能攻击建筑
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Bombard
data.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire

variations.name: Bombard
variations.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire
variations.descriptionCN:
可怕的攻城炮，非常擅于对付建筑或任何顽强的目标。
+ 高伤害
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Buddhist Monk
data.description:
Support unit with the ability to decrease enemy attack damage. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Reduced cost
+ Conversion enhances friendly unit damage
+ Automatically reduces enemy attack damage
+ Heals units

variations.name: Buddhist Monk
variations.description:
Support unit with the ability to decrease enemy attack damage. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Reduced cost
+ Conversion enhances friendly unit damage
+ Automatically reduces enemy attack damage
+ Heals units
variations.descriptionCN:
能够减少敌人攻击伤害的辅助单位。可拾取圣物、招降敌方单位及占领圣地。
+ 成本更低
+ 招降可提高友军单位伤害
+ 自动减少敌人攻击伤害
+ 可治疗单位

data.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units

variations.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
variations.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units
variations.descriptionCN:
强大的攻城器械，擅长从极远的距离摧毁建筑及城墙。
+ 对建筑有伤害加成
- 必须架设才能开火
- 无法精准命中单位

data.name: Explosive Junk
data.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

variations.name: Explosive Junk
variations.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction
variations.descriptionCN:
装满炸药的小船。被歼灭后会爆炸，对区域内的所有单位造成伤害。
- 离爆炸中心越远造成伤害越低
- 自毁是唯一武器

data.name: Fishing Boat
data.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat

variations.name: Fishing Boat
variations.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat
variations.descriptionCN:
从深海鱼群或海岸鱼群采集食物的小型船只。在码头处存放采集到的资源。
+ 可以修理
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Handcannon Ashigaru
data.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

variations.name: Handcannon Ashigaru
variations.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen
variations.descriptionCN:
强大的多用途远程步兵。
+ 高伤害
- 高成本
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Horseman
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵有效突袭、侧翼攻击和克制远程单位.
+ 高移动速度
 - 不擅长对付近战单位
 - 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Junk
data.description:
Oared war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

variations.name: Junk
variations.description:
Oared war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology
variations.descriptionCN:
载有步弓手的带桨战船。
+ 操控性提升
+ 可从铁匠铺的远程伤害科技中获得加成

data.name: Katana Bannerman
data.description:
Samurai with an aura that increases damage of melee infantry. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Banner drops on death
+ Heavy armor
+ Increased move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

variations.name: Katana Bannerman
variations.description:
Samurai with an aura that increases damage of melee infantry. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Banner drops on death
+ Heavy armor
+ Increased move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen
variations.descriptionCN:
日本武士，拥有可增加近战步兵伤害的光环。自带偏转护甲能力，可定期抵挡攻击。
+ 死亡时掉落旗帜
+ 重型护甲
+ 提高移动速度
- 会受到骑士、长矛骑兵和弩手克制

data.name: Mangonel
data.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
- Must be set up to fire

variations.name: Mangonel
variations.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
- Must be set up to fire
variations.descriptionCN:
可发射多枚炮弹对范围区域造成伤害。
+ 擅长对付成群的单位
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Mounted Samurai
data.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and a powerful charge attack. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Heavy armor
+ Deflective Armor recharges out of combat
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
成本昂贵的骑兵，拥有高伤害和强大的冲锋攻击力。自带偏转护甲能力，可定期抵挡攻击。
+ 重型装甲
+ 脱离战斗后偏转护甲会重新充能
+ 擅长近战战斗
- 会受到长矛兵和弩手克制

data.name: Onna-Bugeisha
data.description:
Light melee infantry with fast attack speed and long weapon range.
+ Fast attack speed
+ Fast move speed
+ Long weapon range
- Weak against heavy targets
- Countered by Archers, Knights
data.descriptionCN:
轻型近战步兵，攻击速度快且武器攻击范围远。
+ 攻击速度快
+ 移动速度快
+ 武器攻击范围远
- 不擅长对付重型目标
- 会受到弓兵、骑士克制

data.name: Onna-Musha
data.description:
Highly mobile ranged cavalry effective against heavy units.
+ Fast move speed
+ Long weapon range
+ Bonus damage vs. heavy units
- Weak vs ranged units
data.descriptionCN:
机动性高的远程骑兵单位，擅长对付重型单位。
+ 移动速度快
+ 武器范围远
+ 对抗重型单位可获得伤害加成
- 不擅长对抗远程单位

data.name: Ozutsu
data.description:
Ranged infantry equipped with a huge gunpowder weapon that has good weapon range, siege, and splash damage.
+ Anti-building
+ Area damage
- Slow move speed
- Slow attack speed
- Countered by Horsemen and Crossbowmen

variations.name: Ozutsu
variations.description:
Ranged infantry equipped with a huge gunpowder weapon that has good weapon range, siege, and splash damage.
+ Anti-building
+ Area damage
- Slow move speed
- Slow attack speed
- Countered by Horsemen and Crossbowmen
variations.descriptionCN:
远程步兵，装备巨大的火药武器，拥有优秀的武器攻击范围、攻城和溅射伤害。
+ 反建筑
+ 范围伤害
- 移动速度慢
- 攻击速度慢
- 会受到骑手和弩手克制

data.name: Ribauldequin
data.description:
Five-barreled gunpowder weapon effective against massed units. Deals little damage to buildings.
+ Can hit multiple targets in a single volley
- Short range
- Low ranged armor

variations.name: Ribauldequin
variations.description:
Five-barreled gunpowder weapon effective against massed units. Deals little damage to buildings.
+ Can hit multiple targets in a single volley
- Short range
- Low ranged armor
variations.descriptionCN:
有五根炮管的火药武器，擅长对付成群的单位。能对建筑造成少量伤害。
+ 单次齐射可击中多个目标
- 攻击范围短
- 远程护甲较低

data.name: Samurai
data.description:
Heavy infantry with good damage and defense. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Heavy armor
+ Deflective Armor recharges out of combat
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
重型步兵，具有优秀的伤害和防御力。同时具有偏转护甲能力，可定期抵挡攻击。
+ 重型护甲
+ 脱离战斗后偏转护甲会重新恢复
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到骑士、长矛骑兵和弩手克制

data.name: Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
+ High movement speed
- Very weak in combat

variations.name: Scout
variations.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
+ High movement speed
- Very weak in combat
variations.descriptionCN:
轻武装骑兵，擅长探索世界、狩猎野生动物及牧羊。
+ 能看穿浓密森林
+ 具有生命值恢复能力
+ 高移动速度
- 战斗能力非常弱

data.name: Shinobi
data.description:
Melee infantry that specializes in scouting, sabotage, and assassination.
+ Disguise as enemy Villagers
+ Bonus damage vs. melee
+ Health regeneration
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot disguises

Heals passively.

variations.name: Shinobi
variations.description:
Melee infantry that specializes in scouting, sabotage, and assassination.
+ Disguise as enemy Villagers
+ Bonus damage vs. melee
+ Health regeneration
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot disguises

Heals passively.
variations.descriptionCN:
近战步兵，擅长侦察、破坏和刺杀。
+ 可伪装成敌方村民
+ 对抗近战单位时拥有伤害加成
+ 能恢复生命值
- 首都城镇中心、哨站和侦察兵可以识破伪装

data.name: Shinto Priest
data.description:
Support unit with unique privileges to hold and deposit Yorishiro into buildings. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Yorishiro provide unique bonuses
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow move speed

variations.name: Shinto Priest
variations.description:
Support unit with unique privileges to hold and deposit Yorishiro into buildings. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Yorishiro provide unique bonuses
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow move speed
variations.descriptionCN:
拥有独特特权的辅助单位，可持有依代并将其存放至建筑内。可拾取圣物、招降敌方单位及占领圣地。
+ 依代可提供独特的加成效果
+ 可治疗友方单位
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Siege Tower
data.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.
+ High ranged armor
- Cannot attack
- Slow movement speed

variations.name: Siege Tower
variations.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.
+ High ranged armor
- Cannot attack
- Slow movement speed
variations.descriptionCN:
高大的步兵运输工具，不具备战斗能力。允许将其中驻扎的步兵直接投放到石墙上。
+ 高远程护甲
- 无法攻击
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers
data.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 可对象兵造成额外伤害
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵克制

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings

variations.name: Springald
variations.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings
variations.descriptionCN:
反单位攻城武器。能发射可穿透多个单位的弩箭。
+ 无需架设即可发射
+ 对近战步兵造成额外伤害
- 对建筑造成的伤害极低

data.name: Trade Ship
data.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat

variations.name: Trade Ship
variations.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat
variations.descriptionCN:
商船在被派往有海岸贸易站或其他玩家码头的贸易路线时，可产生黄金和木材。
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Trader
data.description:
Traders generate Gold by travelling between their Home Market and a Trade Post or another player's Market. Greater distances between the Home Market and trade destination will generate higher amounts of Gold.
The Home Market or Trade destination may be changed at any time.

variations.name: Trader
variations.description:
Traders generate Gold by travelling between their Home Market and a Trade Post or another player's Market. Greater distances between the Home Market and trade destination will generate higher amounts of Gold.
The Home Market or Trade destination may be changed at any time.
variations.descriptionCN:
商人通过在他们的本国市场和贸易站或其他玩家的市场之间的往来产生黄金。本国市场和贸易目的地之间的距离越远，产生的黄金就越多。
本国市场或贸易目的地可以随时更改。

data.name: Transport Ship
data.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
- No combat

variations.name: Transport Ship
variations.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
- No combat
variations.descriptionCN:
大型带桨船只，可运送陆上单位渡过水域。
+ 任何单位都能驻扎
+ 使用驻扎于其中的单位的视野范围
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat.
When 5 or more stone is deposited an extra 20% gold is produced and when 5 or more gold is deposited an extra 20% stone is produced.

variations.name: Villager
variations.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat.
When 5 or more stone is deposited an extra 20% gold is produced and when 5 or more gold is deposited an extra 20% stone is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
采集木材、食物、石料和黄金。建造和修理建筑，也可以修理攻城器械和海军单位。
- 战斗能力弱。
当石料储量达到 5 或更多时，会产出额外 20% 的黄金，当黄金储量达到 5 或更多时，会产出额外 20% 的石料。

data.name: War Junk
data.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

data.name: Yumi Ashigaru
data.description:
Quick and cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ Increased move speed
+ Cheaper than Archers
- Reduced health
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
行动迅速且成本低廉的远程步兵，能对无护甲的目标造成可观伤害。
+ 移动速度较高
+ 比弓兵成本低
- 生命值较低
- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制
